name: Defesa Animal
description:
Defesa Animal (Animal Defense) is a ludic educational game in which your mission is to defend your city from cat invaders, and also to finalize the game with highest score possible. To get higher scores, you have to deal with each enemy (adults and kitten) in it's own way. The game is all about making the right decisions and using the right elements to deal with each kind of cat. There are three possible endinings... Why don't you play and discover them all? ;).

Team:

- Sound - Daniel Monteiro

- Programming - Henrique Artur

- Design - Gabura

- Game Design - Ícaro Bacelar
